elementSpec.desc: contains any expression of a set of geographic coordinates, representing a point, line, or area on the surface of the earth in some notation.

attDef.desc: defines how the content of the element should be interpreted.

valItem.desc: a pair of numbers to be interpreted as latitude followed by longitude according to the World Geodetic System.
the value supplied is to be interpreted as a British National Grid Reference.
the value supplied is to be interpreted as latitude followed by longitude according to European Datum co-ordinate system.
the value supplied uses some project-specific or internally-defined system.
